abilities.name: Thunder Fury
abilities.details: Every time Artorias basic attacks or uses Lightning Strike on an enemy hero, he receives a stack of Thunder Fury (maximum 10 stacks). A critical hit will grant him 2 stacks instead.[n]Each Thunder Fury stack increases his critical chance[/]. Artorias's critical chance can exceed 100%, and excessive critical chance will be converted to critical strike damage[/].[n]At maximum stacks, Artorias's basic attack or Lightning Strike creates lightning that deals additional [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to the target and nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.details: Artorias fires a blast of lightning in a target direction, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to all enemies hit (Lightning Strike can critically strike).[n]In Thunder Dragon form, Lightning Strike has a slightly wider and longer range.

abilities.name: Voltaic Body
abilities.details: Artorias gains increased [as]attack speed[/] and [ms]movement speed[/] that decays over a short duration.[n]In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias's basic attacks, Lightning Strike and chained lightning from Thunder Fury also reduce the target's [db]magical resistance[/].

abilities.name: Galvanic Tip
abilities.details: Artorias leaps to a target direction and fires a lightning bolt at the nearest enemy (prioritising enemy hero), dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) and [db]slowing[/] the target for a short duration.[n]In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias uses his tail to pierce at a target direction, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with critical strike damage[/]) to all enemies hit and greatly [db]slowing[/] them down for the same duration.

abilities.name: Storm Breaker
abilities.details: Artorias transforms into the powerful Thunder Dragon, gaining increased [bf]size[/] and maximum stacks of Thunder Fury for a duration.[n]While in Thunder Dragon form, Artorias will always critically strike[/] with basic attacks and Lightning Strike. In addition, his critical chance will be converted to bonus critical strike damage[/] instead.[n]While in Thunder Dragon form, his abilities are enhanced.
